metadata.title: USN-6623-1 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Django incorrectly handled certain inputs that uses intcomma template filter. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6623-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm3 python-django-doc - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm3 python-django-common - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm3 python-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm3 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
